verses.verse: You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> you no <S%H457>idols<s%> nor engraved <S%H6459>image<s%>, neither rear you <S%H6965>up<s%> a standing <S%H4676>image<s%>, neither shall you set <S%H5414>up<s%> any <S%H4906>image<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> in your <S%H776>land<s%>, to bow <S%H7812>down<s%> unto <S%H3068>it<s%>: for I am the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%>.
You shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>, and <S%H3372>reverence<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
If you <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and do <S%H6213>them<s%>;

Then I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H1653>rain<s%> in due <S%H6256>season<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> her <S%H2981>increase<s%>, and the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> their <S%H6529>fruit<s%>.

And your <S%H1786>threshing<s%> shall <S%H5381>reach<s%> unto the <S%H1210>vintage<s%>, and the <S%H1210>vintage<s%> shall <S%H5381>reach<s%> unto the sowing <S%H2233>time<s%>: and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7648>full<s%>, and <S%H3427>live<s%> in your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, and you shall lie <S%H7901>down<s%>, and none shall make you <S%H2729>afraid<s%>: and I will <S%H7673>rid<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>animals<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%>, neither shall the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5674>go<s%> through your <S%H776>land<s%>.
And you shall <S%H7291>chase<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

And <S%H2568>five<s%> of you shall <S%H7291>chase<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, and a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> of you shall put ten <S%H7233>thousand<s%> to <S%H7291>flight<s%>: and your <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.
For I will have <S%H6437>respect<s%> unto <S%H6509>you<s%>, and make you fruitful, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H6965>you<s%>, and establish my covenant with <S%H1285>you<s%>.
And you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> old <S%H3462>store<s%>, and bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H3465>old<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H2319>new<s%>.
And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H5315>you<s%>: and my soul shall not abhor <S%H1602>you<s%>.
And I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H1961>you<s%>, and will be your <S%H430>God<s%>, and you shall <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%>.

I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, which brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, that you should not be their <S%H5650>bondmen<s%>; and I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4133>bands<s%> of your <S%H5923>yoke<s%>, and made you <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H6968>upright<s%>.
But if you will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto <S%H6213>me<s%>, and will not do all these <S%H4687>commandments<s%>;

And if you shall <S%H3988>despise<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, or if your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1602>abhor<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, so that you will not <S%H6213>do<s%> all my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, but that you <S%H6565>break<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%>:

I also will <S%H6213>do<s%> this unto <S%H6485>you<s%>; I will even appoint over you <S%H928>terror<s%>, <S%H7829>consumption<s%>, and the burning <S%H6920>fever<s%>, that shall <S%H3615>consume<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and cause <S%H1727>sorrow<s%> of <S%H5315>heart<s%>: and you shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> in <S%H7385>vain<s%>, for your <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall eat <S%H398>it<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against <S%H5062>you<s%>, and you shall be slain <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%>: they that <S%H8130>hate<s%> you shall <S%H7287>reign<s%> over <S%H5127>you<s%>; and you shall flee when none pursues <S%H7291>you<s%>.
And if you will not <S%H5704>yet<s%> for all this <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto <S%H3256>me<s%>, then I will punish you seven <S%H7651>times<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> for your <S%H2403>sins<s%>.

And I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of your <S%H5797>power<s%>; and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> your <S%H8064>heaven<s%> as <S%H1270>iron<s%>, and your <S%H776>earth<s%> as <S%H5154>brass<s%>:

And your <S%H3581>strength<s%> shall be <S%H8552>spent<s%> in <S%H7385>vain<s%>: for your <S%H776>land<s%> shall not <S%H5414>yield<s%> her <S%H2981>increase<s%>, neither shall the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5414>yield<s%> their <S%H6529>fruits<s%>.

And if you <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H7147>contrary<s%> unto <S%H14>me<s%>, and will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto <S%H3254>me<s%>; I will bring seven <S%H7651>times<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H4347>plagues<s%> upon you according to your <S%H2403>sins<s%>.

I will also <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H2416>animals<s%> among <S%H7921>you<s%>, which shall rob you of your sons, and <S%H3772>destroy<s%> your <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and make you few in <S%H4591>number<s%>; and your high <S%H1870>ways<s%> shall be <S%H8074>desolate<s%>.
And if you will not be <S%H3256>reformed<s%> by me by these <S%H1980>things<s%>, but will walk contrary unto <S%H7147>me<s%>;
Then will I also <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H7147>contrary<s%> unto <S%H5221>you<s%>, and will punish you <S%H1571>yet<s%> seven <S%H7651>times<s%> for your <S%H2403>sins<s%>.

And I will <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon <S%H5358>you<s%>, that shall avenge the <S%H5359>quarrel<s%> of my <S%H1285>covenant<s%>: and when you are gathered <S%H622>together<s%> <S%H413>inside<s%> your <S%H5892>cities<s%>, I will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H5414>you<s%>; and you shall be delivered into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>.

And when I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of your <S%H3899>bread<s%>, <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> shall <S%H644>bake<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8574>oven<s%>, and they shall <S%H7725>deliver<s%> you your <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%>: and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%>, and not be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>.
And if you will not for all <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto <S%H1980>me<s%>, but walk contrary unto <S%H7147>me<s%>;
Then I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H7147>contrary<s%> unto you also in <S%H2534>fury<s%>; and <S%H637>I<s%>, even <S%H3256>I<s%>, will chastise you seven <S%H7651>times<s%> for your <S%H2403>sins<s%>.
And you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%>.

And I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> your high <S%H1116>places<s%>, and cut <S%H3772>down<s%> your <S%H2553>images<s%>, and <S%H5414>cast<s%> your <S%H6297>carcasses<s%> upon the <S%H6297>carcasses<s%> of your <S%H1544>idols<s%>, and my <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall abhor <S%H1602>you<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> your <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H2723>waste<s%>, and <S%H8074>bring<s%> your <S%H4720>sanctuaries<s%> unto <S%H8074>desolation<s%>, and I will not <S%H7306>smell<s%> the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of your sweet <S%H5207>odors<s%>.
And I will <S%H8074>bring<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> into <S%H8074>desolation<s%>: and your <S%H341>enemies<s%> which <S%H3427>live<s%> in it shall be astonished at <S%H8074>it<s%>.

And I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> you among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and will draw <S%H7324>out<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H776>you<s%>: and your land shall be <S%H8077>desolate<s%>, and your <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H2723>waste<s%>.

Then shall the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7521>enjoy<s%> her <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>, as <S%H3117>long<s%> as it lies <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, and you be in your <S%H341>enemies<s%>' <S%H776>land<s%>; even then shall the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7673>rest<s%>, and <S%H7521>enjoy<s%> her <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>.
As long <S%H3117>as<s%> it crouches <S%H8074>desolate<s%> it shall <S%H7673>rest<s%>; because it did not <S%H7673>rest<s%> in your <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>, when you lived upon <S%H3427>it<s%>.

And upon them that are <S%H7604>left<s%> alive of you I will <S%H935>send<s%> a <S%H4816>faintness<s%> into their <S%H3824>hearts<s%> in the <S%H776>lands<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%>; and the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H5086>shaken<s%> <S%H5929>leaf<s%> shall <S%H7291>chase<s%> <S%H5127>them<s%>; and they shall flee, as <S%H4499>fleeing<s%> from a <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> when none <S%H7291>pursues<s%>.

And they shall <S%H3782>fall<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> upon <S%H251>another<s%>, as it were <S%H6440>before<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%>, when none <S%H7291>pursues<s%>: and you shall have no power to <S%H8617>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
And you shall <S%H6>perish<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall eat you <S%H398>up<s%>.

And they that are <S%H7604>left<s%> of you shall pine <S%H4743>away<s%> in their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> in your <S%H341>enemies<s%>' <S%H776>lands<s%>; and also in the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall they pine away with <S%H4743>them<s%>.

If they shall <S%H3034>confess<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, with their <S%H4604>trespass<s%> which they <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against <S%H1980>me<s%>, and that also they have walked contrary unto <S%H7147>me<s%>;

And that I also have <S%H3212>walked<s%> <S%H7147>contrary<s%> unto <S%H935>them<s%>, and have brought them into the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%>; if <S%H176>then<s%> their <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H3824>hearts<s%> be <S%H3665>humbled<s%>, and they then <S%H7521>accept<s%> of the punishment of their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>:

Then will I <S%H2142>remember<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and also my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and also my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H85>Abraham<s%> will I <S%H2142>remember<s%>; and I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.

The <S%H776>land<s%> also shall be <S%H5800>left<s%> of <S%H7521>them<s%>, and shall enjoy her <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>, while she lies <S%H8074>desolate<s%> outside <S%H7521>them<s%>: and they shall accept of the punishment of their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>: <S%H3282>because<s%>, even <S%H3282>because<s%> they <S%H3988>despised<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, and because their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1602>abhorred<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>.

And <S%H637>yet<s%> for all <S%H2063>that<s%>, when they <S%H1571>are<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, I will not cast them <S%H3988>away<s%>, neither will I <S%H1602>abhor<s%> <S%H3615>them<s%>, to destroy them utterly, and to <S%H6565>break<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H3068>them<s%>: for I am the Lord their <S%H430>God<s%>.

But I will for their sakes <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of their <S%H7223>ancestors<s%>, whom I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, that I might be their <S%H430>God<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

These are the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> and <S%H8451>laws<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> between him and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
